code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./SearchButtons.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchButtons=_ref=>{let{query,onSearch}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSearch=()=>{if(onSearch){onSearch();}};const handleLucky=()=>{if(query!==null&&query!==void 0&&query.trim()){navigate("/search?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(query.trim()),"&lucky=true"));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"search-btn",onClick:handleSearch,"aria-label":"Google Search",children:"Google Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"search-btn lucky-btn",onClick:handleLucky,"aria-label":"I'm Feeling Lucky",children:"I'm Feeling Lucky"})]});};export default SearchButtons;
